name: ECOSOC
description: According to the OECD, about 14 percent of all jobs today are vulnerable to automation, with estimates varying among individual nations.

name: SOCHUM
description: Ethnic conflict has been a major issue in the world arguably since human civilization began.

name: NYC Fiscal Crisis
description: The year is 2050 and New York City is enduring yet another fiscal crisis, only 75 years after the last one.

name: Occupation of Cyprus
description: In 1959, Britain signed away its 81 year rule over Cyprus, allowing the country to declare itself an independent republic.

name: England 1066
description: The Battle of Hastings occurred on October 14th, 1066.

name: MCU
description: The Marvel Cinematic Universe (or the MCU) is one of the most well-known franchises in the history of the movie industry, and has influenced modern media over the past decade astronomically.
